syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Physics 9702

subtopic.sub_topic_name: Gravitational field of a point mass

learning_objectives.description: derive, from Newton's law of gravitation and the definition of gravitational field, the equation g = GM/r² for the gravitational field strength due to a point mass
understand why g is approximately constant for small changes in height near the Earth's surface
